div.style: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #F8F6F3 0%, #EAE4DB 100%); min-height: 100vh; width: 100%; margin: 0; padding: 0; position: relative;
position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; width: 600px; height: 600px; background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.08) 0%, transparent 70%); pointer-events: none;
position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 500px; height: 500px; background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.05) 0%, transparent 70%); pointer-events: none;
max-width: 100%; padding: 40px 60px; position: relative; z-index: 1;
margin-bottom: 50px;

text-align: center; padding: 60px 50px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.95) 0%, rgba(212, 175, 122, 0.95) 50%, rgba(184, 151, 111, 0.95) 100%); backdrop-filter: blur(15px); border-radius: 30px; box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(139, 111, 71, 0.25); position: relative; overflow: hidden; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; height: 4px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FFFFFF, transparent, #FFFFFF);
position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; height: 4px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FFFFFF, transparent, #FFFFFF);
position: absolute; top: 20px; left: 40px; font-size: 48px; opacity: 0.2;
position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 40px; font-size: 48px; opacity: 0.2;
position: absolute; bottom: 20px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); font-size: 36px; opacity: 0.2;

h1.style: color: white; margin: 0 0 20px 0; font-size: 56px; font-weight: 900; text-shadow: 3px 3px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); letter-spacing: 3px;

p.style: color: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); margin: 0; font-size: 22px; font-weight: 500; text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);

div.style: margin-top: 25px; display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 30px; flex-wrap: wrap;
background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); padding: 12px 25px; border-radius: 25px; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700; color: white; backdrop-filter: blur(5px);

div.div: โฐ ุชุญุฏูุซ ู ุจุงุดุฑ

div.style: background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); padding: 12px 25px; border-radius: 25px; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700; color: white; backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; margin-bottom: 50px;

background: linear-gradient(145deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #FAF9F7 100%); padding: 40px 35px; border-radius: 25px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.15); border: 2px solid rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.2); transition: all 0.4s ease; position: relative; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer;
position: absolute; top: -50px; right: -50px; width: 150px; height: 150px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C9A875, #D4AF7A); border-radius: 50%; opacity: 0.08;
display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C9A875 0%, #D4AF7A 100%); padding: 15px; border-radius: 18px; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.3);
font-size: 44px; font-weight: 900; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C9A875 0%, #B8976F 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; margin-bottom: 12px;
font-size: 17px; color: #6B6B6B; margin-bottom: 18px; font-weight: 600;

padding: 14px 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(107, 144, 128, 0.15) 0%, rgba(164, 195, 178, 0.15) 100%); border-radius: 15px; display: inline-block; border: 2px solid rgba(107, 144, 128, 0.25);

background: linear-gradient(145deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #FAF9F7 100%); padding: 40px 35px; border-radius: 25px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(232, 180, 184, 0.15); border: 2px solid rgba(232, 180, 184, 0.2); transition: all 0.4s ease; position: relative; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer;
position: absolute; top: -50px; right: -50px; width: 150px; height: 150px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E8B4B8, #D4A5A5); border-radius: 50%; opacity: 0.08;
display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E8B4B8 0%, #D4A5A5 100%); padding: 15px; border-radius: 18px; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(232, 180, 184, 0.3);
font-size: 44px; font-weight: 900; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E8B4B8 0%, #D4A5A5 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; margin-bottom: 12px;
font-size: 17px; color: #6B6B6B; font-weight: 600;

background: linear-gradient(145deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #FAF9F7 100%); padding: 40px 35px; border-radius: 25px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.15); border: 2px solid rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.2); transition: all 0.4s ease; position: relative; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer;
position: absolute; top: -50px; right: -50px; width: 150px; height: 150px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2C3E50, #34495E); border-radius: 50%; opacity: 0.08;
display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2C3E50 0%, #34495E 100%); padding: 15px; border-radius: 18px; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.3);
font-size: 44px; font-weight: 900; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2C3E50 0%, #34495E 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; margin-bottom: 12px;
font-size: 17px; color: #6B6B6B; font-weight: 600;

background: linear-gradient(145deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #FAF9F7 100%); padding: 40px 35px; border-radius: 25px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(107, 144, 128, 0.15); border: 2px solid rgba(107, 144, 128, 0.2); transition: all 0.4s ease; position: relative; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer;
position: absolute; top: -50px; right: -50px; width: 150px; height: 150px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6B9080, #A4C3B2); border-radius: 50%; opacity: 0.08;
display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6B9080 0%, #A4C3B2 100%); padding: 15px; border-radius: 18px; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(107, 144, 128, 0.3);
font-size: 44px; font-weight: 900; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6B9080 0%, #A4C3B2 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; margin-bottom: 12px;
font-size: 17px; color: #6B6B6B; font-weight: 600;
display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; margin-bottom: 50px;

button.name: %(action_brandat_stock)d
button.style: background: linear-gradient(145deg, #D4A373 0%, #E6C9A8 100%); padding: 45px 40px; border-radius: 25px; color: white; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.5s ease; box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(212, 163, 115, 0.3); position: relative; overflow: hidden; border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

div.style: position: absolute; top: -80px; left: -80px; width: 220px; height: 220px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; filter: blur(50px);
display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); padding: 18px 26px; border-radius: 18px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
font-size: 18px; opacity: 0.95; margin-bottom: 25px; font-weight: 600; text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);

padding: 16px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); border-radius: 15px; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; backdrop-filter: blur(5px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

button.name: %(action_brandat_stock)d
button.style: background: linear-gradient(145deg, #C5705D 0%, #D68B75 100%); padding: 45px 40px; border-radius: 25px; color: white; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.5s ease; box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(197, 112, 93, 0.3); position: relative; overflow: hidden; border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

div.style: position: absolute; top: -80px; right: -80px; width: 220px; height: 220px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; filter: blur(50px);
display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); padding: 18px 26px; border-radius: 18px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
font-size: 18px; opacity: 0.95; margin-bottom: 25px; font-weight: 600; text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);

padding: 16px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); border-radius: 15px; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; backdrop-filter: blur(5px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

button.name: %(action_brandat_sale_return)d
button.style: background: linear-gradient(145deg, #7A9CC6 0%, #8FB3D5 100%); padding: 45px 40px; border-radius: 25px; color: white; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.5s ease; box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(122, 156, 198, 0.3); position: relative; overflow: hidden; border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

div.style: position: absolute; bottom: -80px; right: -80px; width: 220px; height: 220px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; filter: blur(50px);
display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 25px;
background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); padding: 18px 26px; border-radius: 18px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
font-size: 18px; opacity: 0.95; margin-bottom: 25px; font-weight: 600; text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);

padding: 16px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); border-radius: 15px; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; backdrop-filter: blur(5px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
background: linear-gradient(145deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #FAF9F7 100%); padding: 50px 45px; border-radius: 30px; box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(139, 111, 71, 0.15); border: 2px solid rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.15);
display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 40px;
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C9A875 0%, #D4AF7A 100%); padding: 20px 28px; border-radius: 18px; margin-left: 25px; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(201, 168, 117, 0.3);

div.h3: ุฅุฌุฑุงุกุงุช ุณุฑูุนุฉ

div.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(220px, 1fr)); gap: 25px;
